[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /secure/simul_efun/tell_creator.c

This method writes a message to a creator, it's mainly meant for debug messages where sending a message to a specific creator is smarter than sending it to players, who will only get confused.

Method index

tell_creator(mixed, string, mixed args)

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.
